name: Create Docupilot product sheets for all Shopify items
description: Let Make create automatically a Product Sheet for every item in your Shopify store. This template requires to make a copy of this [example document](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1k7eYWN91FsW_xRcSikTsQr74OVJ2vw45/view?usp=sharing) and to upload it as a template on Docupilot.
